contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|capella}} '''Capella''' can refer to: * [[Capella (star)]], a bright star in the constellation of Auriga * [[Capella (crater)]], an impact crater on the Moon * [[Capella, Queensland]], a small town in Central Queensland * [[Capella Island]], a minor island of the U.S. Virgin Islands * [[Capella University]], an online academic institution based in Minneapolis, Minnesota * [[Mazda Capella]], a model of automobile manufactured by Mazda * [[USS Capella|USS ''Capella'']], a cargo ship in the United States Navy * [[Capella (notation program)]], a music scorewriter by WHC software * ''[[Gallinago]]'' or ''Capella'', a genus of snipes * [[Capella, Aragon]], a municipality in Huesca, Spain * [[Capella (band)]], was an Italian Eurodance act formed in 1987 ==People with the name== * [[Felix Capella]], Canadian race walker * [[Martianus Capella]], writer and astronomer of late antiquity ==See also== * [[Capela (disambiguation)]] * [[Cappella (disambiguation)]] * [[A cappella (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
